productDescription: The Pinstripe Tee is known for it’s timeless and classical look. No matter the occasion, this tee provides ever lasting comfort, style, and is very easy to combine with your favorite kind of outfits. In short, it’s minimalistic but outstanding looks are perfect for any on- and off-day.

optionalInfo.production: We work in certified production facilities in Europe (Germany) to ensure fair and sustainable production and to prevent child labor.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: Delivery in the Netherlands will take 1-3 days, to EU countries it will take between 3-5 days (on average).
